author: Jacob M. Schlesinger
title: China Fires Back at U.S. on Trade, Challenging Tariffs
text:
WASHINGTON—China is showing a willingness to push back against mounting trade pressure from the Trump administration, filing challenges to new U.S. tariffs on solar panels and washing machines at the World Trade Organization.
The petitions submitted to the global commerce arbiter on Tuesday argue that the tariffs “are not consistent” with international rules, and seek compensation from Washington.
